attachments.title: need consistent approach to publishing documentation · Issue #28 · hyperledger/hyperledger · GitHub
attachments.text: We really need a consistent (and hyperledger branded) means of publishing documentation for the various projects. Right now, we are all over the map. STL publishes <http://intelledger.github.io/> and...
